sentence: The emails show involvement by numerous MAGA crew, including Mark Finchem, a candidate for secretary of State in Arizona, which is terrifying because should he win, he would oversee elections in Arizona.
author: Rebekah Sager
title: Newly uncovered MAGA emails show a sinister conspiracy to refute Biden's win and bestow it on Trump

sentence: Speakers scheduled to address the gathering include Roger Stone, Arizona Republican state Rep. Mark Finchem, Pastor Greg Locke, and Pastor Mark Burns.
author: Bob Brigham
title: Eric Trump praises huge portrait of his dad at conspiracy theorist conference: ‘I love that’

sentence: Other speakers scheduled to address the conference include Eric Trump, Roger Stone, Arizona Republican state Rep. Mark Finchem, Pastor Greg Locke, and Pastor Mark Burns.
author: Bob Brigham
title: Mike Flynn describes battle against school boards like a military action: 'We're gonna counter-attack'

sentence: Arizona State Representative Mark Finchem appeared on Steve Bannon’s War Room to tell us what this means for Katie Hobbs.
author: Jordan Conradson
title: WATCH: Arizona State Rep. Mark Finchem on Katie Hobbs’ Potential Prosecution: “She Knowingly Did This. I Don’t See How This Doesn’t End Up In Some Kind of a Conviction”
